name: Splicer Slicer
description:
Splicer Slicer is the fast-paced rogue-like arena brawler made for the 7-Day Roguelike 2021 Game Jam!

Battle waves of enemies increasing in size as you slice them apart and steal the elite enemy abilities! Watch out, every round, a piece of the level will collapse, and a new one will rise elsewhere!

Build a unique character each game from the parts of your fallen enemies and slowly grow more and more powerful!
